thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: MARY MACK
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by MARY MACK

author: MARY MACK
title: MARY MACK
text: I had a very good experience with ADS. I had questions about how to order my prescription goggles. I called up and a live person answered the phone and resolved every question. I also needed them on a rush basis for an upcoming trip. When I placed the order I was given a discount I didn't know my product qualified for. The goggles got to me in time--no problem! I got friendly service. The site is easy to use and if you have further questions, there is a friendly, knowledgable person at the other end of the telephone line. I will not hesitate to order from them again.
